b'Hengen Taima Yakou Karura Mau! Sendai: b'Shoko and Maiko Ougi are apparently two ordinary schoolgirls in pursuit of graduating and having fun. Shii-chan is the more serious while Mai-chan is more fun-loving. In reality, the two sisters are powerful exorcists from the Karura temple. Each wields half the power... Shii-chan can "see" the spirits, and Mai-chan can banish them. This is a spooky series with heavy emphasis on traditionally Japanese occult themes. \n\n(Source: AnimeNfo)'
[b'Hengen Taima Yakou Karura Mau!', b'Hengen Taima Yakou Karura Mau! Nara Onryou Emaki']
